summary: Build a reusable tugboat-list component that renders tugboats from a provided JSON file, replacing selected elements on Tugboat pages and automatically reusing the component across all tugboat-related pages.
architectural_notes: Tugboat pages should use a shared/reusable TugboatList component fed by a JSON data source (Tema fleet).
Selected placeholder elements on Tugboat pages will be fully replaced by the generated TugboatList output.

existing_features.title: Create a reusable TugboatList component that renders ALL tugboats from the provided Tema fleet JSON (port/authority/fleet_last_updated plus tugboats array) and displays each tugboatâ€™s full details: id, name, IMO number, year built, type, specifications (bollard pull tonnes, gross tonnage, length, beam, max draught, engine power when present), capabilities, status, and last_maintenance when present.

Replace ONLY the content within the selected Tugboat page elements (XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1] and its first paragraph /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]/p[1]) with the new TugboatList output, so the page shows all results properly without leaving the old placeholder paragraph content.

Make the TugboatList component automatically reusable across tugboat-related pages by integrating it wherever tugboat fleet results are displayed (at minimum, the /tugboats route page), using the same shared component rather than duplicating markup.

Store the provided Tema fleet JSON in the frontend codebase as a dedicated data source (static JSON/TS module) and render from it (not from backend getAllTugboats), ensuring the UI matches the provided JSON fields (e.g., IMO number, capabilities, gross tonnage, beam, max draught).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a tugboat list component that renders all tugboats from the provided Tema fleet JSON and replaces the selected elements on all tugboat-related pages (reusable across pages).

projectName: Replace Tugboat page main content with reusable Tema fleet JSON tugboat list
